title: Granny on the Roof Rack
subtitle: Did a car thief steal an automobile with a dead body in it?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An old woman traveling in a car filled with relatives dies during a long journey. The surviving family members place her corpse on the car’s roof rack, cover it with a tarp, and continue on. Upon reaching the nearest town, the family stops for a coffee and something to eat, leaving Granny’s remains tied to the roof rack. They return to the parking lot to find their vehicle — and their dead relative — gone.
